title: Operator Learning on Manifolds
summary: DeepONets for PDEs on spheres and tori; training on FEM/manufactured data with surface differential operators.

title: Taylor-Enhanced DeepONets
summary: Incorporate higher-order Taylor terms and physics residuals into the objective for improved stability and generalization.
